scripts.limpieza: php artisan cache:clear &&  php artisan route:clear &&  php artisan config:clear &&  php artisan view:clear
scripts.server: php artisan cache:clear &&  php artisan route:clear &&  php artisan config:clear &&  php artisan view:clear && php artisan serve
scripts.rutas: php artisan route:list > rutas.txt && notepad rutas.txt
